backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining admin login, access control, storage mixins, and data types for clients, transporters, loads, tracking, and documents.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new schema, updating contracts, loads, clients, transporters, and associated types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping document listing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and metadata for frontend and backend changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their roles and recent updates.
frontend/.gitignore: Standard .gitignore configuration excluding dependencies, build outputs, environment files, IDE files, and Capacitor artifacts.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining the password‑based admin system, token flow, route protection, and backend integration details.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files, covering prerequisites, environment setup, signing, versioning, and Play Store preparation.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, build directory, HTTPS Android scheme, and keystore-based signing options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template for configuring Android signing environment variables for release builds.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Script that builds and outputs a debug APK after checking prerequisites and syncing Capacitor.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Script that builds a signed Android App Bundle for Play Store using provided keystore credentials.
Script that builds a signed release APK for distribution using Android signing variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring React Query, theming, routing, and global notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAssig: Admin UI control to assign or unassign verified transporters to a load using select input.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Dialog for viewing, editing, deleting, and updating verification status of a client.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminConta: Dialog for viewing and deleting individual contact messages submitted by users.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLoadD: Admin dialog for viewing and editing load details, including updating, deleting, assigning client/transporter, and approving or rejecting loads.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTrans: Admin dialog for editing transporter details, deleting a transporter, and updating verification status.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminYears: Admin interface for adding and removing available years, with validation and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays a transporter's submitted location evidence with timestamps, map data, and screenshot viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Shows a list of transporters with contact info, truck type, status, and live location freshness indicators.
Filter controls for transporter list, allowing hiding those without locations and filtering by truck type.
Displays transporter locations in a simple map-like grid with selectable details and handles missing or errored map data.
Fetches transporter data, applies filters, and renders map or list views with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with load/error diagnostics and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Shows a dismissible bottom advertisement using loaded ad settings and embeds the snippet preview.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with support contact and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminContac: Modal dialog showing submitted contact message details with a placeholder delete action.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets queries and shows a recovery UI on failure.
UI for admin access errors offering retry or sign‑out actions and clearing cached state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials to access restricted areas.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity auth, shows loading states, and triggers optional post-login callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter name and email and submit profile creation via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks admin status, handles redirects, shows loading or error states, and renders children only for admins.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with company info, quick links, coverage areas, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout including top navigation, routed content outlet, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, mobile menu, branding, and login button with post-login navigation.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Dialog for capturing geolocation and uploading an image as load interest evidence with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons if available.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Card allowing transporters to start or stop live location sharing, showing status, errors, and last update time.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: React card component that displays and updates a transporter’s operational status using queries and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Reads and normalizes a bootstrap admin principal from environment variables and compares it to the current principal.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines AdMob config and manages loading and saving bottom ad settings from localStorage.
frontend/src/config/download.ts: Provides a helper to read a fallback Android APK download URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Exports constants for admin token storage and change event names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and reinitializes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations to grant or bootstrap admin access by assigning admin roles and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively via a custom event listener.
Exports helpers to verify admin access using an admin token and update query cache, plus a hook wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, profile, role, and admin state into a unified auth object with loading and error logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, clear, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for backend operations such as contact messages, admin checks, client info, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Hook that manages periodic geolocation tracking, error handling, and sending live location updates to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating the logged-in user's profile and role using React Query and an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and global utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the company, mission, values, and regional coverage.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that loads clients, transporters, loads, messages, and manages detail dialogs and admin actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Admin login page handling credential input, token storage, admin verification, and diagnostic logging.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Client registration form that loads existing data, submits client info with contract details, and shows verification status.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form allowing users to submit inquiries, plus static company contact info.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Page for verified users to post contracts and browse/filter existing contracts by year.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPage.tsx: Displays Android APK download link with fallback handling and installation guidance.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, company overview, calls to action, and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Load board for transporters and clients to post, view, and manage freight loads with verification checks.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a services overview page with cards describing logistics offerings and a 'How It Works' section.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Implements a transporter registration form with authentication checks, document handling, and submission logic.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure using TanStack Router and configures a hash-based router.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides a utility to convert objects to CSV format and trigger a file download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, and design tokens including colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, high-level summary, architectural notes, known issues, and lists of existing and new feature requests for an admin logistics system. Captures schema versioning and context needed for continued feature development.
